# MiniTorch Module 2

<img src="https://minitorch.github.io/minitorch.svg" width="50%">


* Docs: https://minitorch.github.io/

* Overview: https://minitorch.github.io/module2/module2/

This assignment requires the following files from the previous assignments. You can get these by running

```bash
python sync_previous_module.py previous-module-dir current-module-dir
```

The files that will be synced are:

        minitorch/operators.py minitorch/module.py minitorch/autodiff.py minitorch/scalar.py minitorch/scalar_functions.py minitorch/module.py project/run_manual.py project/run_scalar.py project/datasets.py

## Training Summary

### Simple

Hyperparameters:
- Hidden: 2
- Rate: 0.5
- Epochs: 250
- Data points: 50
- Time per epoch: 0.049 seconds

![simple](simple.png)

![simple loss](simple_loss.png)

### Diagonal
- Hidden: 2
- Rate: 0.5
- Epochs: 250
- Data points: 50
- Time per epoch: 0.050 seconds

![diagonal](diagonal.png)

![diagonal loss](diagonal_loss.png)

### Split

Hyperparameters:
- Hidden: 5
- Rate: 0.1
- Epochs: 750
- Data points: 50
- Time per epoch: 0.133 seconds

![split](split.png)

![split_loss](split_loss.png)

### XOR

Hyperparameters:
- Hidden: 8
- Rate: 0.1
- Epochs: 600
- Data points: 50
- Time per epoch: 0.252 seconds

![xor](xor.png)

![xor loss](xor_loss.png)

### Circle

Hyperparameters:
- Hidden: 12
- Rate: 0.1
- Epochs: 1000
- Data points: 50
- Time per epoch: 0.566 seconds

![circle loss](circle_loss.png)
